item.title: Curses
item.description: Using ncurses library with C Hello there today i will cover some basic functions of <curses.h> library in c. firstly to Compile in gcc you must use -lncurses flag for curses library like this : gcc <fileName>.c -lncurses Basic curses Functions Function Description initscr() Starts Curses mode ans sets upÂ stdscr (Standard screen) printw() Print on the screen refresh() Refresh the screen clear() Clears the screen getch() Get user input endwin() End curses mode raw() Disable line buffering noecho() Don’t print user input by default keypad(stdscr, TRUE); Enable Function keys input Some examples with Curses Hello World #include <curses.
